artefact.overview: Use the tax credits calculator to get an estimate of what you might qualify for
artefact.more_information:
%Don't use this calculator if you're on Pension Credit and work more than 16 hours a week.%

##What you will need

- details of your income and, if you have one, your partner's income
- details of any benefits you are claiming, or have just stopped claiming
- your working hours 
- the average amount you spend each week on childcare
artefact.introduction: Get an estimate of how much you could qualify for from today's date to the end of this tax year.
artefact.alternate_methods: Call the [Tax Credit Helpline](/contact-the-tax-credit-office "Contact the Tax Credit Helpline") for an estimate of how much tax credits you could get.

details.description: Includes working tax credit, child tax credit and when tax credits stop
